description: Our focus is to change the way you perceive cotton candy.  With the use of only all natural and organic ingredients, we weave in dry toppings and powders to complete flavors that you’ve never seen with cotton candy.  Gone are the days of boring and overly sweet blue or pink cotton candy.   The new standard includes flavors like Salted Chocolate Peanut Butter, Li Hing Pineapple, Spicy Mango, Cookie Butter, and Nutella Strawberries & Bananas just to name a few.
name: Sugar & Spun
